summary: The "environmental industry" encompasses a range of sectors focused on the development and implementation of technologies and services aimed at environmental protection and sustainability. Within the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, this industry plays a crucial role in achieving the objectives of environmental policy, particularly in relation to the European Green Deal and the Circular Economy Action Plan. The environmental industry is instrumental in fostering innovation, promoting resource efficiency, and ensuring compliance with stringent environmental regulations. By facilitating the transition to a low-carbon economy, it supports the EU's commitment to sustainable development and environmental stewardship.
